originalText.text: My mother lived at this location for many years 1980 Lexington Ave 3h . She passed away earlier this year. I met with Ms. Lopez 122 east 128 st .she seemed very nice. I went along with Mr. Antonio Vincent social worker from 1940 Lexington Ave. He helped me with visit to management  office. A very nice person. Was. Lopez and a conversation. I explained that I explained and I could not clean the apt except for weekends. So was willing to accommodate me and things that I had to leave behind she accommdated with that . I needed  extra time to finish, Mr. Vincenti requested more time for me and she excepted.my mother had antagonizing death. I went through a lot being she was my remaining parent. I gave Mr. Vincenti the keys along with some documents on time. I went to Mr. Vincenti. Office. He called and spoke to Ms. Lopez aka Alexandra bretanaidez. After this came deception, denials by her. All of a sudden someone else a Mr. Hernandez, her supervisor whom which I never met. I believe he is the property manager. I never had an encounter with this Individual.mr. Antonio vincenti was told that I gave the keys back late. Mr. Hernandez was never in this picture and the only one that told him that was ms.lopez aka Alexandra bretanaidez the claims are false. Now she is stating she had nothing to do with anything and placing the blame to just Mr. Hernandez  .there has To be accountability  in this situation. No respect for the deceased and family members. I'm very shocked and dismayed by these two individuals who I'm  sorry to say work for nycha and leads me to believe they are both corrupt and will go through any length to do dirty work such as this. I pray that mayor Adam's do something in regards to my situation. I believe my mother and I suffered enough forget my mother's security fund's. It seems that these two individuals will stop at nothing. God don't  like ugly what goes around comes around

originalText.text: Seniors are still enduring problems ,no hot water intercom still not working . Nyacha has gotten a very bad reputation which will not change unless the mayor does something about and safety concerns are priority always. The mayor needs to do more. Unfortunately when you have bad management situations get far worse.noe they use illegal tactics to scare seniors and get rid of them. To climb the corporate ladder people still resort to play dirty. Seniors have no right they believe. They do have rights. Be kind and be careful what you do in life .what you do wrong eventually comes back to haunt you. My mother waited in vain for painting. Unfortunately she past away early this year.

originalText.text: Very bad service. Apartment leaking about 6-7 month , no one fix. Service guys came 5 time. They just leave it complain number.
